Keep condiments organized and easily accessible at your concession stand, sandwich shop, or snack bar with this Carlisle 38503 condiment dispenser! The Carlisle 38503 condiment dispenser features 3, standard plastic pumps that that can be set to dispense either .5 oz. or 1 oz. portion per stroke. Three, 2 1/2 qt. fountain jars are included, which remove for easy cleaning and refilling. The Carlisle 38503 condiment dispenser is made of durable stainless steel, and measures 14 1/2"W x 7 3/4"D x 12 1/2"H. 38503 From Carlisle Less The WEBstaurant Store 267 store reviews See Store Info /carlisle-38503-condiment/P1eapO_tSRMSJpFXQg9ayA==/info The WEBstaurant Store $364.09 $139.99 62% Off No Shipping Info Visit Store -50% Star Manufacturing International 3WLA-4H Star Manufacturing International 3WLA-4H from $286.00 50% Off Free Shipping 8 stores See Details -21% Napkin, Lid, Condiment Dispenser - Black- 17 1/2"lx5"wx8"h Napkin, Lid, Condiment Dispenser - Black- 17 1/2"lx5"wx8"h Fast Delivery, 110% Price Match Guarantee ( In stock ) This Napkin, Lid, Condiment Dispenser is a convenient organizer where you can place almost all of the things needed. It can holds 4 inches Lids&5 inches Napkins. This Napkin, Lid, Condiment Dispenser is manufactured by CalMil. You are guaranteed that CalMil uses only the highest quality materials when manufacturing their products. ( In stock ) This dishwasher safe pump comes with a polycarbonate pump and stainless steel case. Also features a metal fastener with a hinged slot so it can be pad locked to a base. (Sorry, padlock not... More
This dishwasher safe pump comes with a polycarbonate pump and stainless steel case. Also features a metal fastener with a hinged slot so it can be pad locked to a base. (Sorry, padlock not included) Includes fewer parts than other standard pumps, so it's easy to clean. Choose from three settings, from thick to thin! Perfect for any condiment from syrup and ketchup to thicker bases like salsa and relish. This condiment dispenser fits a #10 can, gallon jug or a pouch pack. Features: Durable, stainless steel, polycarbonate construction. Removable parts are all dishwasher safe. Pumps a wide range of products from syrups to relish. 3 discharge fittings ranging from thin to thick. Dispense directly from a #10 can or 1-gallon jar. Includes hasp that locks to base (Lock not included). . Specs: Dimensions: 7"W x 17"H x 11"D. Weight: 7 lb. NSF Approved. . Ships within 2 business days. Two year warranty on parts and labor.
